description:
### Leap Year

A leap year is exactly divisible by 4 except for century years (years ending with 00). The century year is a leap year only if it is perfectly divisible by 400. Thus, 2000 is a leap year but 2100 is not. This program determines whether a year is a leap year.

Input: Year as integer.
Output: Boolean value, True if year is leap and False otherwise.

Example:

```js leapYear(2000) // True ```
